README.rst:
Linearized and Single-Pass Belief Propagation (LinBP and SBP) in SQL
====================================================================


Home of ``LinBP in SQL`` on github:
`http://github.com/sslh/linbp/ <http://github.com/sslh/linbp/>`__


Documentation
-------------

This is the SQL code (version July 17, 2014) for the experiments and methods described in the following paper:

1. `Linearized and Single-Pass Belief Propagation <http://www.vldb.org/pvldb/vol8.html>`__. `Wolfgang Gatterbauer <http://gatterbauer.co>`__, `Stephan Gunnemann <http://www.cs.cmu.edu/~sguennem/>`__, `Danai Koutra <http://web.eecs.umich.edu/~dkoutra/>`__, `Christos Faloutsos <http://www.cs.cmu.edu/~christos/>`__. PVLDB 8(5): 581-592 (2015). [`Paper (PDF) <http://www.vldb.org/pvldb/vol8/p581-gatterbauer.pdf>`__], [`Full version (PDF) <http://arxiv.org/pdf/1406.7288>`__]



Usage & Documentation
---------------------

To run the code:

1. Run ONCE the code from:

.. code:: bash

	SQL_LinBP.sql
	SQL_SBP.sql
	SQL_SBP_addBeliefs.sql
	SQL_SBP_addEdges.sql

2. Run the SQL commands from:

.. code:: bash

	SQL_Example_Torus.sql


See annotations in individual files plus explanations in: <http://arxiv.org/abs/1406.7288>
